alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Hendry; Inland Collier County; Mainland Monroe (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 8:02PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Collier, northern Mainland Monroe and Hendry Counties through 845 PM EDT... At 802 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a funnel cloud along a line extending from 8 miles east of Felda to 8 miles south of Hendry Correctional to near Chokoloskee. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chokoloskee, Montura, Everglades City, Immokalee, Plantation Island, Felda, Carnestown, Copeland, Hendry Correctional, Big Cypress Seminole Reservation, Big Cypress National Preserve, Devils Garden, Sunniland, Bunker Hill, Miles City, Jerome and Deep Lake. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Hendry; Inland Collier County; Mainland Monroe
